name: Møgluder: The Rabbit Age
description:
As one of the Ancient Rabbit Lords, battle for control of the RabbiSphere. In this local multiplayer game, you will be throwing rabbits into battle, transforming them into destructive cannons, in an attempt to annul the existence of your foes.

Made by:

  • Christoffer: Music and Sound. Controller Programming
  • Sketchwhale: Design and Art
  • Jmaa: Gameplay and Art Programming.
